text: [[Mirrage Mirror]] and [[Unstable Obelisk]] were champs for Gonti today against Nekusar. As was [[Spawning Pit]]...

text: I was able to sac Glonti to Spawning Pit to put a second counter on it, and then use Tragic Slip to get rid of Nekusar. Nekusar swung at me with a creature to be able to recast Whispering Maddness to kill us both (I had turned the Mirror into a [[Megrim]], but had 1 open mana and created a token from Pit to block. Then on my turn was able to kill the rest of the table.
